Introduction.Name: Dark Elves
Introduction.Description: The Dark Elves, or the Druchii as they call themselves in their own tongue, also known as the Naggarothi or the "Dark Ones", are one of the most ancient, powerful, and certainly the most sadistic of the three Elven civilisations of the world.||In the bleak, chilly lands of the continent of Naggaroth in the New World lies the Dark Elven kingdoms of the Witch King Malekith, a realm born from the depths of malice and hate, a kingdom that seeks nothing more than to despoil a world its people believe loathes their existence. With malevolent eyes, the Dark Elves watch this dying world, knowing it is their birthright to rule all that they survey and those that live upon it are born to do nothing more than to grovel at their feet.||The Druchii are raiders, slavers and heartless reavers of the first degree, their every whim being nothing more than to sow misery and pain to all that oppose them, for misery and pain is the very lifeblood of their existence. Thus do their Black Arks and Corsair Fleets ply the great waters of the world, raiding and enslaving all before them as a tribute to their own avaricious desires.

Artefact.Name: Sword of Striking
Artefact.Description: +1 to Hit

Artefact.Name: Sword of Battle
Artefact.Description: +1 Attack

Artefact.Name: Sword of Might
Artefact.Description: +1 Strenght

Artefact.Name: Biting Blade
Artefact.Description: -1 Armour save

Artefact.Name: Enchanted shield
Artefact.Description: 5+ Armour save

Artefact.Name: Talisman of Protection
Artefact.Description: 6+ ward save

Artefact.Name: Staff of Sorcery
Artefact.SpecialRule: +1 to dispell
Artefact.Description: +1 to dispell

Artefact.Name: Dispell Scroll
Artefact.Description: automatically dispel an enemy spell, one use only

Artefact.Name: Power Stone
Artefact.Description: +2 dice to cast a spell

Artefact.Name: War Banner
Artefact.Description: +1 Combat Resolution

Artefact.Name: Executioner's Axe
Artefact.SpecialRule: Strength double that of his target's Toughness
Artefact.Description: When rolling to wound in close combat and for armour save modifier purposes, the wielder counts as having a Strength double that of his target's Toughness. However, the Executioner's Axe is two-handed and the wielder always strikes last except in the turn he the turn he charges.

Artefact.Name: Venom Sword
Artefact.SpecialRule: Any model which loses a wound to the Venom Sword (after saves, etc) must roll equal to or under its Toughness on 2D6 or is automatically slain
Artefact.Description: Any model which loses a wound to the Venom Sword (after saves, etc) must roll equal to or under its Toughness on 2D6 or is automatically slain.

Artefact.Name: Blade of Ruin
Artefact.Description: No armour saves may be taken against hits from the Sword of Ruin. Ward saves may be taken as normal.

Artefact.Name: Hydra Blade
Artefact.SpecialRule: D3 additional attacks
Artefact.Description: A character wielding the Hydra Blade gains D3 additional attacks (roll each Close Combat phase the Hydra Blade is used).

Artefact.Name: Crimson Death
Artefact.Description: A model wielding Crimson Death always strikes with Strength 6. No other modifiers will ever reduce this. Requires two hands to use.

Artefact.Name: Lifetaker
Artefact.SpecialRule: Crossbow hits on a 2+, may re-roll to wound
Artefact.Description: Lifetaker is treated like an ordinary repeater crossbow, with the following additional rules. Lifetaker always hits on 2+, regardless of To Hit modifiers. You may re-roll failed rolls to wound with Lifetaker. Remember that a dice can never be re-rolled more than once.

Artefact.Name: Web of Shadows
Artefact.SpecialRule: Enemy automatically takes 2D6 Strength 3 hits, one use only
Artefact.Description: One use only. The character uses the Web of Shadows instead of making any normal attacks that round. When used, one model in base contact with the character automatically takes 2D6 Strength 3 hits. A character with a Web of Shadows may also take an ordinary close combat weapon (but not another magic weapon).

Artefact.Name: Heartseeker
Artefact.Description: The character may re-roll all missed attacks with Heartseeker. Remember a dice can never be re-rolled more than once.

Artefact.Name: Chill Blade
Artefact.SpecialRule: Any model wounded may not attack for the rest of that combat round
Artefact.Description: Any model wounded by a Chill Blade (after saves, etc) may not attack for the rest of that combat round.

Artefact.Name: Dark sword
Artefact.SpecialRule: Any model losing one or more wounds becomes subject to the rules for stupidity for the remainder of the battle
Artefact.Description: Any model losing one or more wounds (after saves, etc) to the Dark Sword becomes subject to the rules for stupidity for the remainder of the battle.

Artefact.Name: Armour of Living Death
Artefact.Description: The Armour of Living Death counts as heavy armour, giving a 5+ armour save, which can be combined with other armour as normal. In addition, the model has +1 Toughness and +1 Wound.

Artefact.Name: Armour of Eternal Servitude
Artefact.Description: This light armour gives a basic 6+ save, which can be combined with other armour as normal. In addition, the wearer can regenerate.

Artefact.Name: Shield of Ghrond
Artefact.SpecialRule: All hits the character suffers will be resolved with -1 Strength
Artefact.Description: The Shield of Ghrond is treated like a normal shield, and in addition all hits the character suffers will be resolved with -1 Strength.

Artefact.Name: Armour of Darkness
Artefact.Description: This armour includers a shield and gives a save of 2+ which cannot be improved in any way.

Artefact.Name: Blood Armour
Artefact.SpecialRule: For every inflicted wound in close combat, armour save is improved by one point
Artefact.Description: Blood Armour is treated as a suit of normal heavy armour (5+ save) and can be combined with other armour as normal. For every unsaved wound the wearer inflicts, their save is improuved by 1 (to 4+ then 3+, etc) up to maximum of 1+.

Artefact.Name: Black Amulet
Artefact.SpecialRule: If ward save test is passed, the attacking model suffers 1 wound instead (with no armour save allowed)
Artefact.Description: The wearer has a 5+ Ward save against close combat hits. If the wearer of the Black Amulet passes his Ward save then the attacking model suffers 1 wound instead (with no armour save allowed).

Artefact.Name: Deathmask
Artefact.Description: The wearer of mask causes terror

Artefact.Name: Crown of Black Iron
Artefact.SpecialRule: Completely immune to the effects of Light Magic and High Magic
Artefact.Description: The character has a 5+ Ward save. In addition to this, the wearer is completely immune to the effects of Light Magic and High Magic spells. Note that this is not a Dispel and thus other models (excluding the character's mount) may be affected by High Magic and Light Magic.

Artefact.Name: Seal of Ghrond
Artefact.Description: The seal of Ghrond adds one dice to the Dispel dice pool of the army.

Artefact.Name: Ring of Hotek
Artefact.SpecialRule: Any magic user (friend or foe) attempting to cast a spell within 6" of the wearer will miscast on the roll of any double
Artefact.Description: Any magic user (friend or foe) attempting to cast a spell within 6" of the wearer will miscast on the roll of any double. If they roll a double 6 they cast the spell (with Irresistible Force) and then suffer a Miscast.

Artefact.Name: Rubric of Dark Dimensions
Artefact.SpecialRule: Bound spell, power level 3, one use only: all enemy models in base contact must roll equal to or under their Strength on a D6 or be slain
Artefact.Description: One use only. Bound spell, power level 5. All enemy models in base contact with the bearer must roll equal to or under their Strength on a D6 (6 always fails) or be sucked into the dimension of Eternal Nightmares (and count as slain!).

Artefact.Name: Ring of Darkness
Artefact.SpecialRule: Bound spell, power level 4, remains in play: attacks in close combat against the wearer require a 6 to hit
Artefact.Description: Attacks in close combat against the wearer require a 6 to hit regardless of Weapon Skills and modifiers. Remains in play.

Artefact.Name: Crystal of Midnight
Artefact.SpecialRule: Bound spell, power level 3, one use only: enemy Wizard must pass a Leadership test on 3D6 otherwise they forget one randomly spell
Artefact.Description: One use only. Nominate a Wizard anywhere on the table. The Wizard must pass a Leadership test on 3D6 otherwise he forgets one randomly determined spell for the rest of the battle.

Artefact.Name: Soulstone
Artefact.SpecialRule: Immune to the effects of her first Miscast
Artefact.Description: A Soulstone makes the Sorceress immune to the effects of her first Miscast. Note that a Miscast spell still fails regardless of the actual dice score rolled.

Artefact.Name: Black Staff
Artefact.SpecialRule: There is no maximum number of Power dice to attempt a spell
Artefact.Description: There is no maximum number of Power dice the wielder can use to attempt a spell.

Artefact.Name: Darkstar Cloak
Artefact.Description: The cloak gives the Sorceress +1 power dice in each of her own Magic phase. Only she may use this extra dice.

Artefact.Name: Tome of Furion
Artefact.SpecialRule: 1 additional spell
Artefact.Description: The Tome of Furion grants its bearer one additional spell.

Artefact.Name: Banner of Nagarythe
Artefact.Description: This standard adds +1 to the combat resolution of all units withn 6" and the unit carrying the banner is Unbreakable

Artefact.Name: Hydra Banner
Artefact.Description: All models in the unit (including mounts) gain +1 Attack in the first round of any hand-to-hand combat

Artefact.Name: Dread Banner
Artefact.Description: The unit carrying this standard causes fear

Artefact.Name: Banner of Murder
Artefact.SpecialRule: +D6" into its charge moves
Artefact.Description: The unit adds +D6" into its charge moves. Declare charges first and then roll. If the charge is failed the unit will move forward its normal failed charge distance.

Artefact.Name: Standard of Slaughter
Artefact.Description: The unit gains +D3 to its combat resolution the first time it charges.

Artefact.Name: Manbane
Artefact.SpecialRule: Counts their Strength as one higher than their target's Toughness, unless their Strength would normally be more than this, up to a maximum of Strength 6
Artefact.Description: A character with a weapon coated with Manbane always counts their Strength as one higher than their target's Toughness, unless their Strength would normally be more than this, up to a maximum of Strength 6. In effect, this means that they almost always wound opponents on a roll of 3+. This modified Strength is also used to calculate armour save modifiers.

Artefact.Name: Black Lotus
Artefact.SpecialRule: For every Wound suffers a enemy model (after saves, etc) also lose 1 point from all of their other characteristics except Movement
Artefact.Description: For every Wound a model suffers from a weapon poisoned with Black Lotus (after saves, etc) they also lose 1 point from all of their other characteristics except Movement. This lasts for the rest of the battle.

Artefact.Name: Dark Venom
Artefact.Description: The model is considered to have Poisoned Attacks.

Artefact.Name: Dance of Doom
Artefact.Description: The model has a 5+ Ward save.

Artefact.Name: Touch of Death
Artefact.Description: The model has the Killing Blow special ability

Artefact.Name: Rune of Khaine
Artefact.SpecialRule: Must always pursue fleeing enemies
Artefact.Description: The Rune of Khaine grants +1 Attack to its bearer. A model marked with the Rune of Khaine must always pursue fleeing enemies.

Artefact.Name: Hand of Khaine
Artefact.SpecialRule: Any one model in base contact will lose one Attack
Artefact.Description: Any one model (chosen by a Dark Elf player) in base contact will lose one Attack. Against mounted models, the Dark Elf player must choose either the mount/monster or the rider. If the model has several types of attack (an extra bite, for example) the Dark Elf player chooses which type of attack is lost. Models which are immune to psychology are not affected by the Hand of Khaine.

Artefact.Name: Witchbrew
Artefact.SpecialRule: Enemy units cannot claim the +1 combat resolution bonuses for outnumbering, flank and rear attacks or higher ground
Artefact.Description: Hags only. The Hag and her unit drink the Witchbrew before the battle. Enemy units cannot claim the +1 combat resolution bonuses for outnumbering, flank and rear attacks or higher ground.

Artefact.Name: Cry of War
Artefact.SpecialRule: A unit charged character must pass a Leadership test or reduce their Weapon Skill by -1 for the duration of that Close Combat phase
Artefact.Description: A unit charged by a warrior with a Cry of War must pass a Leadership test or reduce their Weapon Skill by -1 (to a minimum of 1) for the duration of that Close Combat phase.

Hero.Name: Malekith
Hero.Description: Malekith, the Witch King of Naggaroth

Special.SpecialRule: If your army is led by Malekith, Black Guard are no longer a 0-1 choice - you may include as many units as you have Rare choices
May re-roll missed close combat attacks against High Elves in any round of combat, not just the first round

HandWeapon.Name: Destroyer
HandWeapon.SpecialRule: If Malekith hits an opponent with a magic weapon or with magic armour, instead of rolling to wound you may choose to destroy one item (opponent's choice)

Special.SpecialRule: Always use Dark Magic, you may choose which four spells she has at the start of the battle
Adds +2 to all of her casting rolls
Any Witch Elves within 12" may use her Leadership value, as if she was their army General

Arcane.Name: Enchanting Beauty
Arcane.SpecialRule: Any enemy model in base contact with Morathi at the start of round of combat must pass a Leadership test or have their WS reduced to 1 for the duration of that round

Hero.Name: Malus Darkblade
Hero.Description: Malus Darkblade, Scion of Hag Graef

Demon.Name: Tz'arkan
Demon.SpecialRule: If Malus is in base contact with a friendly model and not in contact with the enemy in any close combat phase, roll a D6: on a 4+ Tz'arkan's murderous rage drives Malus to attack his allies
